sentence.Network_en: He knocked out an enemy tank with his bazooka.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用火箭微摧毁了辆敌军的坦克.

sentence.Network_en: They have a bazooka and you have a water pistol.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们手上拿着火箭筒,而你只有一把水枪.

sentence.Network_en: The soldier knocked out two enemy tanks with his bazooka.
sentence.Network_cn: 那士兵用火箭炮击毁敌人两部坦克车.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s (in sense 2; originally US): apparently from US slang bazooin the original sense 'kazoo'

encyclopedia.content: bazooka是一种基于高爆反装甲弹药的单兵反坦克武器，广泛被美国海陆空三军使用，是2战中的经典武器之一。因为长的酷似美国喜剧演员Bob Burns使用的同名乐器而得名bazooka,现也被广泛做为单兵火箭发射器的代名词。于1942年第一款M1装备后又有多种变种型号。

entry.def: A bazooka is a long, tube-shaped gun that is held on the shoulder and fires rockets.

means.word_mean: 1. a portable rocket launcher used by infantrymen as an anti-tank weapon

auth_sentence.content: And then there was my weapon, this super-weapon—a machine-gun-bazooka-flame-thrower all in one.
